page.title: 15POLITICS IN DIPTON.
page.content:
{Paul Curry's uncle,Mr.Joe Walker,stood {as a Labour Candidate in the 1985 {County Council Elections for the {Dipton Ward.His only opponent was an {Independent Candidate,Mr.Jimmy Downes. {Mr.Walker polled 1,380 votes & Mr. {Downes polled 1,106 votes.Uncle Joe {was thrilled that he won the election.
A 100 Men & 100 Women in Dipton were asked the foolowing 3 questions;
{Did you vote in this year's County {Council Elections? Top Ans. NO-48.5%.
Do you think that Gt.Britain should stay in the E.E.C.? NO-55%
{What do you fear most for {the Human Race in the years {to come?.........NUCLEAR WARFARE.-65%
